title: Separators
description: To provide more flexibility with rendering of controls and sections, set the visibility of the separator lines.

TopSectionSeparator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator line at the top of the section. iOS only.

BottomSectionSeparator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator line at the bottom of the section. Default value for iOS is false, for Android and Web it is true.

HeaderSeparator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator line between the header and section.

FooterSeparator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator line between the footer and section.

ControlSeparator.description: Sets the visibility of the separator lines between controls inside a section.
